alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 17 at 9:13PM CDT until March 17 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL LINCOLN AND EASTERN PAYNE COUNTIES... At 912 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ripley, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, quarter size hail, and accumulating small hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Cushing, Perkins, Yale, Glencoe, Ripley, Agra, Quay and Ingalls. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Accumulating small hail may make travel difficult on roadways.
